TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingCompleteEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含例外狀況或繫結程序期間發生的錯誤的相關資訊。The contains information regarding exceptions or errors that occurred during a binding process. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範處理事件。The following code example demonstrates handling the event. 若要執行此程式碼，請將它貼到空白程式碼檔案。To run this code, paste it into an empty code file. summary.span: 以指定的繫結、錯誤狀態和繫結內容來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified binding, error state, and binding context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `state` 表示繫結程序順利完成還是發生錯誤或例外狀況。`state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred. `context` 表示更新繫結的控制項或資料來源時，是否發生錯誤。`context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.

param.span: 表示取消繫結以及將焦點維持在目前控制項上； 表示允許將焦點移位到另一個控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `state` 表示繫結程序順利完成還是發生錯誤或例外狀況。`state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred. `context` 表示更新繫結的控制項或資料來源時，是否發生錯誤。`context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.

summary.span: 取得與這次發生的 事件相關聯的繫結。

span.span: Gets the binding associated with this occurrence of a event.
The associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 也可能會與相關事件或繼承自類別。The might also be associated with the event of a or of a class that inherits from . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件並使用以確保當控制值的其中一個變更時繫結至相同的資料來源的多個控制項都能保持同步。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and use the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`InitializeControlsAndData`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 取得繫結作業的完成狀態。

span.span: Gets the completion state of the binding operation.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來判斷是否繫結成功，或發生錯誤或例外狀況。Use the to determine if the binding was successful, or an error or exception occurred. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Binding1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Binding1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#77)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#77)]

summary.span: 取得在繫結作業期間所發生的錯誤之文字描述。

span.span: Gets the text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.

value.span: 在繫結作業期間所發生的錯誤之文字描述。

span.span: The text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果繫結作業中不發生任何錯誤，這個屬性會傳回空字串。This property returns an empty string if no error occurred in the binding operation. 它會傳回的值屬性時發生例外狀況。It returns the value of the property when an exception occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Binding1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Binding1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#77)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#77)]

span.span: The that occurred during the binding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`null`如果未繫結作業期間發生例外狀況。This property returns `null` if an exception did not occur during the binding operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件並使用以確保當控制值的其中一個變更時繫結至相同的資料來源的多個控制項都能保持同步。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and use the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`InitializeControlsAndData`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]
